channel.title: R notes to myself
channel.description: Recent content on R notes to myself

item.title: curiouser
item.description: What a treat it was to finally meet Charles Gray when she was in Sydney last week. She ran her R-Curious workshop for us and I picked up so many useful markdown tips.

item.title: #SoDS18
item.description: Twitter is such a great R learning resource. The people who follow the #rstats hashtag are so generous with their time. You can post a question/problem with the hashtag and someone will reply and try and help you within about 20 min. It is awesome.

item.title: git thinking
item.description: The amazing Charles Gray was extraordinarily generous with her time tonight trying to help be troubleshoot deploying this site (love R-ladies). I learned a lot about git.
